column12:
As per
information
received from
the officials of
PWD (Roads),
Lakhimpur,
Ranganadi and
Bihpuria
Territorial
Road Division,
Lakhimpur, on
14.06.2024
due to Flood
water from
River Singra
the road
Pandhowa to
Mahghuli
(PMGSY
Package No.
AS15189) was
overtopped
with an
average depth
of 600 MM
and breached
from
CH.1320.00 M
to CH.1340.00,

for a stetch of
20.00 M
shoulder and
surface has
been damaged
due to erosion
near the
breached
portion.
